description: Try our easy to follow Eamon's Smiley Face Nachos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Nachos,Seafood free,Broccoli,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Beef,Zucchini,Wheat free,Mince,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Eamon's Smiley Face Nachos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs reduced fat tasty cheese, grated

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a small frying pan over medium heat.
Add mince and cook for 5 minutes until well browned.
Add vegetables and crushed tomato and cook for 5 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Pile corn chips onto a heatproof plate.
Grill for 12 minutes until warmed and cheese has melted.
Halve 1 cherry tomato and set aside.
Chop remainder and add a little lemon juice.
Mix corn with capsicum, onion, coriander and lime juice.
Top corn chips with mince mixture, tomato salsa and corn salsa.
Decorate like a face using halved tomato for eyes, broccoli floret for nose and red capsicum for eyebrows and mouth.
